Features

Everything You Need in One Extension

Our smart Megan can become your personal secretary and a comfortable friend!

Browser Management

Our beloved Megan can search for information and navigate various resources on the internet for you.

Secretary Capabilities

She can also save notes for you so you don't have to keep them in your mind UwU.

Media and Music

Megan can play and control music and videos, adjusting the volume or switching tracks as you wish.

How It Works

Simple Process, Powerful Results

Get started in minutes — all the power of the extension, with none of the complexity.

01

Create Account

Register with your email or google authentication to unlock access.

02

Install the Extension

Add the extension from the Chrome Web Store and log in to your account.

03

Upgrade Anytime

Enjoy core features for free or upgrade to Pro for advanced capabilities — right from the extension.
